text:
```Music is our safety net.
In the spirit of community after Tuesday’s dramatic events, Voicebox wants to provide a safe space for our guests to come together and share in our values of mutual respect, do the right thing and feeling groovy!

Tonight and tomorrow, all Voicebox locations will have dedicated suites for public, FREE, community karaoke. No reservation needed, just show up at any of our locations between 4PM to midnight. Minors are welcome until 9PM.

We are still honoring previously booked reservations, as private suite karaoke at regular rates. Questions or updates can be directed to Guest Services at <tel:503-303-8220|503-303-8220> (Portland) or <tel:720-458-7006|720-458-7006> (Denver).

Connect with us to get back the best night of your week!```
this is a great public service
I think I’d be down. The one near work?

tonight?
tomorrow would be okay too
i could do either, but i'm still a little hung over from yesterday
so... tomorrow?  afterwork?  sing and then dumplings.  or dumplings and then sing
